mapper.select: SELECT `a`.`ACTIVITY_ID` AS `activityId`, `b`.`title` AS `title`, concat(`a`.`LEVEL`, `aa`.`LEVEL`) AS `levelAll`, IF ( ( isnull(`u`.`nickname`) OR (`u`.`nickname` = '') ), `u`.`name`, `u`.`nickname` ) AS `male`, `a`.`LEVEL` AS `levelMale`, `aa`.`LEVEL` AS `levelFamale`, `u`.`gender` AS `genderMale`, IF ( ( isnull(`uu`.`nickname`) OR (`uu`.`nickname` = '') ), `uu`.`name`, `uu`.`nickname` ) AS `female`, `uu`.`gender` AS `genderFemale`, bu.PHOTO malePhoto, buu.PHOTO famalePhoto FROM `wwd_activity_user_mutual_election` `a` LEFT JOIN `wwd_activity` `b` ON `a`.`ACTIVITY_ID` = `b`.`id` LEFT JOIN `wwd_user` `u` ON `a`.`WWD_USER_ID` = `u`.`id` LEFT JOIN base_user bu on bu.ID=u.user_id LEFT JOIN `wwd_user` `uu` ON `a`.`SELECTED_WWD__USER_ID` = `uu`.`id` LEFT JOIN base_user buu on buu.ID=uu.user_id LEFT JOIN `wwd_activity_user_mutual_election` `aa` ON `aa`.`ACTIVITY_ID` = `a`.`ACTIVITY_ID`AND `aa`.`WWD_USER_ID` = `a`.`SELECTED_WWD__USER_ID` AND `aa`.`SELECTED_WWD__USER_ID` = `a`.`WWD_USER_ID` AND `aa`.`DEL_FLAG` = 'N' WHERE `a`.`DEL_FLAG` = 'N' AND `u`.`gender` = 'male' AND a.ACTIVITY_ID =#{activityId} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM `wwd_activity_user_mutual_election` `t` WHERE `t`.`DEL_FLAG` = 'N' AND `t`.`ACTIVITY_ID` = `a`.`ACTIVITY_ID` AND `t`.`WWD_USER_ID` = `a`.`SELECTED_WWD__USER_ID` AND `t`.`SELECTED_WWD__USER_ID` = `a`.`WWD_USER_ID`) ORDER BY `a`.`ACTIVITY_ID`, concat(`a`.`LEVEL`, `aa`.`LEVEL`)
